nodes.text: Dante Basco (born August 29, 1975) is an American actor, voice actor, and dancer. He is best known for his role as Rufio in the 1991 live-action film Hook. He is also known for voicing Zuko in the Nickelodeon series Avatar: The Last Airbender, and Jake Long from the Disney series American Dragon: Jake Long. He provides the voice for Jai Kell in Star Wars Rebels episodes "Breaking Ranks" and "The Occupation". He has also served as narrator for all the episodes of Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures.
